    • takeTokens

      public void takeTokens(List<Token> take, HashMap<TokenType,Integer> putBack)
      Takes / puts back tokens for the player's turn.
      Parameters:
      take - The tokens the player wishes to take during this turn.
      putBack - The tokens the player wishes to put back this turn.

    • buyCard

      public void buyCard(DevelopmentCard card)
      Adds purchased card to inventory and removes cost from player (for their turn).
      Parameters:
      card - The development card the player would like to purchase.

    • reserveCard

      public void reserveCard(DevelopmentCard card)
      Add card to reserved cards for a player and add one gold token to inventory (for their turn).
      Parameters:
      card - The development card the player would like to reserve.
